plot: A man suffering from bipolar lives in remorse for the murder of his beloved. He takes refuge in alcohol and drugs trying to erase the ghosts of his past, living in a state of hallucination in search of a redemption.
title: La teoria del vaso
plot_es: A man suffering from bipolar lives in remorse for the murder of his beloved. He takes refuge in alcohol and drugs trying to erase the ghosts of his past, living in a state of hallucination in search of a redemption.
plot_en: A man suffering from bipolar lives in remorse for the murder of his beloved. He takes refuge in alcohol and drugs trying to erase the ghosts of his past, living in a state of hallucination in search of a redemption.
